Package pamMaths

Class PamInterp

java.lang.Object
pamMaths.PamInterp
public class PamInterp extends Object
Interpolation library. Initially based on code by

Static methods for doing useful interpolation

: $Revision: 1.1 $

  • Method Details

    • interp1

      public static final double[] interp1(double[] x, double[] y, double[] xi) throws IllegalArgumentException
      ID interpolation of an array.
      Parameters:
      x - - the x values of the array.
      y - - the y values of the array
      xi - - the x values to calculate new y values for.
      Returns:
      interpolated array. Out of range values are NaN
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • interp1

      public static final double[] interp1(double[] x, double[] y, double[] xi, double NaNVal) throws IllegalArgumentException
      ID interpolation of an array.
      Parameters:
      x - - the x values of the array.
      y - - the y values of the array
      xi - - the x values to calculate new y values for.
      NaNVal - - value to set for xi values which are out of range.
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException
